Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES

Title: Relates to training of day care center employees in the administration of opioid antagonists
Summary: Requires all employees of a family day care center, group family day care center, school-aged child care program, and child day care center be trained in administering an opioid antagonist; requires a child day care to stock at least one opioid antagonist.
LawCode: Amd ยง390-a, Soc Serv L; amd ยง3309, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the public health law, in relation to requiring all employees of a child day care to be trained in administering an opioid antagonist
